errors.emailExists: An account with this email already exists
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.noToken: No authentication token found. Please log in again

labels.name: Full name
labels.haveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in

dashboard.description: This application helps you match transactions from different data sources.

manageDataSources.title: Manage Data Sources
manageDataSources.description: Create and manage data sources for your transaction data.

uploadData.title: Upload Transaction Data
uploadData.description: Upload transaction data from CSV files to be matched.

dataSources.title: Data Source Management
dataSources.description: Data sources represent different transaction origins such as general ledger systems, bank statements, or other financial data providers.
dataSources.name: Name
dataSources.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this data source?

schema.title: Schema Definition
schema.description: Define the structure of your data source to ensure proper data validation and mapping.

fields.title: Fields
fields.name: Field Name
fields.nameTooltip: The column name as it appears in your data
fields.formatTooltip: Format pattern for dates or numbers
fields.descriptionPlaceholder: Add a description of this field...

dateFormat.title: Date Format
dateFormat.label: Default Date Format
dateFormat.tooltip: Format used for parsing dates (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD for 2023-01-31)

mappings.title: Default Mappings
mappings.description: Map standard transaction fields to your custom fields
mappings.fieldTooltip: Map {{field}} to a custom field in your data source

requiredFields.title: Required Fields
requiredFields.description: Select which standard transaction fields are required

imports.title: Import Records
imports.description: View and manage all imports for this data source.
imports.deleteConfirmContent: Are you sure you want to delete this import? This will remove all transaction data associated with this import.
imports.noImports: No imports found for this data source

rawTransactions.title: Raw Transactions
rawTransactions.description: View the raw transaction data as imported from the source file.
rawTransactions.noTransactions: No transactions found in this import

upload.title: Upload Transaction Data
upload.description: Upload transaction data from CSV files to be used in the matching process.
upload.dateFormatHint: Format for parsing dates in your CSV (example: 2006-01-02 for YYYY-MM-DD)

fileUpload.title: File Upload
fileUpload.dragText: Click or drag CSV file to this area to upload
fileUpload.hint: Only CSV files are supported. The first row should contain headers.

columnMapping.title: Column Mapping
columnMapping.description: Map CSV columns to transaction fields
columnMapping.instructions: Map your CSV columns to the required transaction fields

upload.processDescription: Review your file and column mappings before completing the upload

dataSourceSelect.label: Data Source
dataSourceSelect.help: Select the data source for this transaction data

validation.waitForUpload: Please wait for the file upload to complete before continuing
validation.uploadFirst: Please upload a file and wait for the server to process it before proceeding
validation.noDataParsed: No data has been parsed from your file. Please try uploading a different file
validation.fileRequired: No file selected. Please select a CSV file first.
validation.dataSourceRequired: No data source selected. Please select a data source before uploading.

matchset.title: Matchset Configuration
matchset.description: Configure rules for automatically matching transactions

matched.title: Matched Transactions
matched.description: Review and manage transactions that have been matched

unmatched.title: Unmatched Transactions
unmatched.description: Review and manage transactions that could not be matched

userManagement.title: User Management
userManagement.name: Name
userManagement.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

common.connectionFailed: Could not connect to the backend server
